item.title: Using Emacs Series
item.description: Link to current configuration: https://github.com/zamansky/using-emacs Introduction Video 1 - Setting up the package manager Video 2 - Intro to Org Mode Video 3 - How to think about Emacs Video 4 - Buffers Video 5 - Windows Video 6 - Search / Swiper Video 7 - Navigation / avy Video 8 - Autocomplete Video 9 - Themes Video 10 - Org init files Video 11 - org-reveal / reveal.
